name: Detariki Z
storyline:
The time is present day.
Suddenly, a mysterious life form descends from outer space!

The mysterious life form is just ......, which is just lumbering along in all directions!

They do not retreat from the road even when you honk your car horn,
It did not respond to our attempts to serve it food and catch it with bait,
They don't move when children throw stones at them and poke them with sticks. ......

Yes, they do not attack people, they are just "in the way".

They are not even known what kind of organism they are, and for some reason, modern firearms are ineffective against them.
However, we could not just leave it there, so we forced the government to raise the budget and set up the "Special Defense Bureau of the Ministry of Science and Technology.
The "Anti-Mutant Organism Task Force" was established by the Special Defense Bureau of the Ministry of Science and Technology.
However, the results were not as good as expected, and the public ridiculed the group as taxpayers' thieves. ......
A member of the squad and the newly appointed squad leader are involved in an incident while on a mission to deal with a "jammer," as it is commonly called!
summary: Detariki Z is a “girl and jammer cooperative RPG”.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: 「デタリキＺ　特別防衛局隊員の日常」PV
